Package core.planner

This package contains the classes relative to CoRe Planner.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Standardizable Classes that implement this interface must define a method standardize.
Substituable This interface defines the methods that must be implemented by substituable object.
Term The Term class implements a term.
 

Class Summary
Action The Action class implements an action.
AgentDescription Defines the description of an agent in terms of skills and beliefs.
Assumption This class implements what is an assumption.
Atom The Atom class implements an atom.
Axiom The Axiom class implements a axiom.
AxiomSet The AxiomSet class implements a list of axioms.
Conjecture The Conjecture class implements a conjecture.
Conjunction The Conjunction class implements a Conjunction.
ConjunctionList The ConjunctionList class implements a list of conjuncts.
Constant The Constant class implements a constant.
Decomposition The Decomposition class implements a decomposition of method.
DecompositionList The DecompositionList class implements a list of decompositions.
Domain The Domain class implements a planning domain.
DomainSet The DomainSet class implements a set of domains.
Function The Function class implements a function.
Literal The Literal class implements a literal which is any of the folowing: a logical atom a; an expression of the form (not a) where a is a logical atom (the intended meaning is that the expression is true if a is false).
Logger The Logger class implements a list a useful methods used to log the Planner.
Method The Method class implements a method.
MethodSet The MethodSet class implements a list of methods.
Operator The Operator class implements an operator.
OperatorSet The OperatorSet class implements a list of operators.
Parser Implements the Parser of core Planner.
Planner The Planner class implements the main class of the Java Assumption-based Planner.
Problem The Problem class implements a planning problem.
ProblemSet The ProblemSet class implements a set of problems.
State The State class implements a State of the world.
Substitution The Substitution class implements a substitution.
SubstitutionList The SubstitutionList class implements a list of substitution.
TaskAtom The TaskAtom class implements a task in Planner.
TaskList The TaskList class implements a list of TaskAtoms.
TheoremProver Implements the usefull method to manage Terms,Atom s and Substitutions.
Variable The Variable class implements a variable.
 

Enum Summary
Assumption.Type Define the different type of an Assumption.
 

Exception Summary
SubstitutionException This exception is thrown if an error occurs during unification process.
UnificationException This exception is thrown if an error occurs during unification process.
 

Package core.planner Description

This package contains the classes relative to CoRe Planner.
